text: The European Commission approves placing up to a 45 percent tariff on Chinese-made electric vehicles. Japan's new prime minister, Shigeru Ishiba, describes five areas important to Japan's defense, including the Japan-US Security Alliance and the ability to recover from natural disasters.

Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Kamanee praised Hezbollah on state TV and said his country is ready to launch more missiles at Israel. And Israel's military says two of its soldiers were killed late Thursday in the Golan Heights, as it continues to strike the militant group Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.
